plot: Flash Purdue incites the ranchers by accusing the Benson family of murder. They are warned in time and cross the border to safety. Muley Benson however stays and joins the rodeo circuit. Five years later he gets a request to return. Arriving he is made a prisoner by Flash who now plans to kill him for having shot him in the ear earlier when he called the Benson's murderers.   Written by  Maurice VanAuken
title: Border Vengeance

cast.role: Peeler Benson, aka The Muley Kid
cast.name: Reb Russell
